body:
Select Top 100  SMK.StokIslemAkisID, IAM.IslemAkisMID, IAM.SiparisIslemAkisMID, SIAM.SiparisIslemAkisAdi, IAM.IsletmeIslemAkisAdi, SMK.HamUrunTID, SMK.HamKumasUrunTID,
        S.AnaUrunTID, S.RenkID, S.RenkMenseiID, RM.RenkMenseiKodu, S.NakisDesenID, S.NakisDesenVaryantID, *
From    IT06_Stoklar_MamulKumas SMK
        Inner Join IT06_Stoklar S On S.UrunTID = SMK.UrunTID
        Inner Join IT06_StoklarIslemAkis SIA On SIA.StokIslemAkisID = SMK.StokIslemAkisID
        Inner Join IT06_IslemAkisM IAM On IAM.IslemAkisMID = SIA.IslemAkisMID
        Inner Join IT04_SiparisIslemAkisM SIAM On SIAM.SiparisIslemAkisMID = IAM.SiparisIslemAkisMID
		LEFT OUTER JOIN IT01_RenkMensei RM On RM.RenkMenseiID = S.RenkMenseiID
--Where   SMK.UrunTID = 149868
